name: Lobster Jo's Beach Camp

pages.faq: Not found - check under About or More menus

navigation_structure.note: Dropdown menus with expandable submenus. 'Book a Camp' CTA in header

data_hints.pricing_location: Not visible on homepage - likely on individual program pages
data_hints.sessions: Weekly sessions during summer (specific dates on program pages)
data_hints.locations: Santa Barbara waterfront (Skater's Point, Stearns Wharf area), Goleta (new 2025 location)

beach_camp.description: Ocean activities, beach-themed arts and crafts, group games, sandcastle contests, surfing, beach party karaoke
beach_camp.location: Stearns Wharf area, Garden St. lot for drop-off/pickup

art_camp.description: Morning art lessons (painting, sculpting, plant pressing, beading) + afternoon Beach Camp activities

skate_camp.description: Skateboarding technique at Skater's Point skate park
skate_camp.end_of_day: Skills demo for family and friends

half_day.description: Extension from partner camps (Ceramics, Skate, Beach Volleyball) to Beach Camp

junior_counselors.description: Teens earn Community Service Hours for high school graduation requirements

brand_tagline: SKATIN' CRAFTIN' SURFIN' - in no particular order...
mission: Adventure & Curiosity Inspire Tomorrow's Leaders. We Are FUN. We Are STEWARDS.
special_notes: Site type: Small Business. Modern Wix-based website with video background on homepage. Strong beach/ocean focus with local SB expertise (Skater's Point, Stearns Wharf, FunkZone). New Goleta location added 2025. Multiple camp types for variety. Junior Counselor program for teens. Strong testimonials section. Some program links may redirect externally.
scraping_challenges: Video background on homepage (lobster jo's beach city approved v1.1.mov)
Some links redirect to external sites unexpectedly
Pricing not prominently displayed on homepage

contact.form: Footer contact form on main page
contact.newsletter: Newsletter signup with phone/email in footer

santa_barbara.area: Waterfront - Stearns Wharf, Skater's Point, FunkZone
santa_barbara.landmarks: Beach demarcated with giant lobster flags

testimonials_highlight: Clear winner out of a dozen summer camps
Kids excited to go in the morning, exhausted by pickup
Easy drop-off/pickup from Garden St. lot
